item.title: Lock please..ppl don't post
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

i wish i had a satan isle source to reference to help you but i hate satans isle very very much and i don’t have one downloaded

but heres a basic idea of what you’re going to want to do …

run your server then click on the object that gives you xp
then either look at the actionbutton number to figure out the case or read the message it sends to you and search for that in your client.java

say you were attacking a dummy it would be like this

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You Attack The Dummy."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((xp*playerLevel[0]), 0); actionTimer = 12; } break;

you can then change the xp to whatever you want the xp times the players level to be you can also change the number of the level you want it to train.

you can also change the message it sends to whatever you want it to say.

just find the case of the item you’re attacking.

If you want to change the xp you get from monsters post and i’ll get that for you

Read full topic
